meanings.definition: Lacking intelligence or common sense; foolish.
meanings.sent1: She made a featherheaded decision without thinking it through.
meanings.sent2: It was a featherheaded mistake to leave the keys in the car.
meanings.sent3: His featherheaded choice to wear shorts in the snow made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The featherheaded plan to build a house of cards collapsed instantly.
meanings.sent5: The featherheaded idea of using a fork to eat soup was quickly abandoned.

meanings.definition: Having a light or frivolous attitude; flighty.
meanings.sent1: Her featherheaded behavior at the party annoyed some guests.
meanings.sent2: The featherheaded girl changed her mind about the movie three times.
meanings.sent3: His featherheaded jokes kept the mood light during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The featherheaded butterfly flitted from flower to flower in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The featherheaded song lyrics made everyone smile with their silliness.
